author: quest.zwerg
title: #G4L Gaming Expo-Festival 2022 GSA
description: Хотели бы представить Cardano Catalyst Gamers On-Chained Challenge европейскому сообществу инди-игр и потребителям в 2022 году.

f6_assessments.q0: Я твердо верю в массовое принятие Cardano через игры, но, к сожалению, из-за того, как структурировано это предложение, оно быстро становится непонятным для тех, кто ограниченно интересуется играми, и для специалистов по общему анализу, что может навредить этому предложению. С самого начала постановка проблемы не является постановкой проблемы, что уже задает негативный тон. В тексте есть многочисленные упоминания о том, что это мероприятие будет проходить в ногу со временем, о прямой трансляции мероприятия, об использовании маркетингового агентства, о команде по взаимодействию с сообществом, об авторитетном партнерстве со СМИ и т.д., но все это - действия, предпринятые руководством мероприятия. Нет четкой цели от лица самого участника, во что выльется его участие в этом мероприятии, например, освещение в СМИ, упоминания в СМИ, предполагаемые посетители стенда, конверсия лидов, вовлеченность в социальных сетях и т.д., и как все это будет связано с целями постановки задачи. Я был бы рад помочь в формулировании этого предложения и хотел бы узнать об этом предложении раньше, но, к сожалению, я не могу оправдать свою личную предвзятость, чтобы дать оценку выше, чем 3 звезды. 3 звезды могут показаться высокими, но, исходя из личного опыта, участие в крупной выставке может резко повысить узнаваемость бренда, в данном случае бренда Cardano's Gaming Ecosystem, но для достижения этой цели вам потребуется много инструментов вовлечения. Рекомендуем проконсультироваться со школой Catalyst о том, как сформулировать эффективное предложение в следующий раз.
f6_assessments.q1: Из кратких данных, предоставленных автором предложения об их опыте и полномочиях, зная, кем они были до этого, нет сомнений, что они могут обеспечить разработку игры. Возможно, это не очень хорошо соотносится с тем, что они предлагают сейчас - провести мероприятие на крупной выставке. Нет никакого упоминания о том, кто будет заниматься эксплуатацией стенда. Также нет четкого плана, что будет происходить во время работы стенда, каков их план привлечения, какие маркетинговые материалы будут использоваться для представления игровой экосистемы Cardano, кто будет покрывать расходы на привлечение и маркетинговый план и т.д. Несмотря на упоминание необходимого бюджета, детали его использования почему-то вынесены в раздел комментариев. Судя по имеющимся цифрам, большая часть бюджета идет на изготовление стенда. К сожалению, нет четкого графика, когда все должно начать выполняться, например, начиная с самых простых действий, таких как печать маркетинговых материалов.
f6_assessments.q2: Если рассматривать это предложение вне контекста и сосредоточиться на использовании бюджета на изготовление стенда, то оно вполне проверяемо, но есть цели этого челленджа, которых необходимо придерживаться, и в лучшем случае, как правило, очень трудно проверить участие в любой выставке. Тем более в случае, если нет четких планов действий в течение всего периода участия. Возможно, этого можно избежать в будущем, если согласовать со школой Catalyst, как сформулировать предложение. Начиная с постановки проблемы и ее решения, чего в данном предложении также не хватает. Хотя это предложение очень нравится, пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз.

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea of hosting a Cardano specific stand at a Gaming event is a really good idea. This proposal is however is quite confusing on what it is trying to achieve and how its going to achieve it. An ask of $15k for this proposal doesnt feel like goo value for money. I would have expected a lot more background work to be done at this stage with only 2 months to go  (eg engage all gaming related projects from previous funds, have more details of how the proposers see exhibition flowing over the 3 days). Having exhibited in many international venues around the globe it is essential each day is planned in detail with objectives and targets otherwise the days go by very quickly and nothing is achieved.
As it stands if this proposal was asking for $1 or $2k (to cover cost of exhibiting with some incidental costs. It could then act as a pilot exhibition & proposers could then come back in a future fund with 'proof' and arrange a much larger event.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal provides a decent outline of a plan but it is not easy to understand.
A simple presentation would have helped showing how activities, resources and funds  are aligned.
The $15k is not broken down so it is impossible to work out how its going to be spent.
The proposers could really help themselves by adding their LinkedIn profiles or evidence of their experience in this area.

i hope the proposer takes onboard these comments in a positive light and returns with a more coherent proposal or uses the comments section or ideafest to provide clarity on the questions answered.
f6_assessments.q2:
No metrics or KPI's have been provided that align to the challenge. eg is the proposer looking to encourage new gaming proposers in future funds?
Also the obvious risk of COVID has not been taken in to account, what is the mitigation (if any) and what will happen to unwed funds if the exhibition is cancelled?

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely that a lot of Gaming tradeshows are out there, BUT not even one is promoted by Cardano
. 
It is clear that this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief by   presenting the Cardano Catalyst Gamers On-Chained Challenge to the European Indie Games Community and Consumers in 2022
 
This proposal shows how it adds value to the Cardano system byproviding exposure of the Cardano based games to the overall gaming community and exposing the Cardano game developers to a real game expo environment where they could network and collaborate and make useful connections.

 
  Key metrics  would be  number of participants,  number of events, number of stalls, number of games presented, number of new developers represented.
 

The key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge
  
 
Proposal can be scaled up to address future challenges by adding more game development companies to this event.  it could also setup facilities at other events for more Cardano game developers 

This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system by increasing the collaboration between game developers, game reselling companies and brands and the overall gaming community

I can say that this proposal adequately addresses the challenge  hence i have given it a 5 star rating.
 

If this does not receive funding for whatever reason, one way proposer can improve it is by continuing to build and send press releases to media of your country or social media relating to your subject. Sometimes that one step might motivate someone to view the link and add credibility for your project and give him a better idea on the project which enables him to vote for the project. 

You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise.

I am qualified to write this assessment based on being a translator since 1992 at the State Broadcasting Corporation as well as since that time,running my own translation agency, working with the two native languages of my country as well as working on various translation projects into other languages, including translation, transcription and proofreading. I have also been an event organizer in various capacities, both through my company and on a voluntary basis for youth groups and churches.  I also have run a web development company from 1997 and have been the author of many ground breaking projects in web and Flash related projects in my country.I have done live event with guests in studio, discussing various topics on the State Broadcasting Channels for both National and International audiences.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers  has not provided ample evidence  of themselves with their skills and experience in gaminr or organizing similar events. His name is given but no profile links on FB IG or Linkedin are given. There is a link to the event website but there is no way to link that to the proposer nor to see whether its a comprehensively planned event
 
 
 The links are not sufficient. 
 
I have   emailed the relevant people but not received a response as yet.
   
It is hard to say if the proposers are  experienced and competent to do the event.
 
 The type and number of team members required to implement the proposal is not stated.
 
 
The team structure is not listed  .

 The budget has not been given in detail. 
 
The budget is not reasonable to achieve the set goals. I am not sure if the 15000 is to rent some stalls or for organizing an entire convention.  
Has the proposer provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required to implement the proposal?
 
The proposer has not provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required  
 

There is no plan for additional funding  if objectives are not met. 
 
Theres no realistic timetable  to complete the work
 
The proposal gives  a sensible and conductible plan for implementation.  .
 
Resources  necessary to implement the proposal are not described.   
  
The proposal has technical aspects which have not been addressed 
 
The proposer has not identified risks in this proposal  
 
Given experience and plan presented it is not highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully
 This proposal is not detailed and budget cannot be assessed hence I have given it a 2 star rating.   



A piece of advice... You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise. A proposer who has considered this, would be looked on more favorably since it shows that they are prepared for various situations and eventualities
f6_assessments.q2:
There is no clearly laid out roadmap with milestones  
  
 There are  Metrics such of number of participants a and number of events and discussion rooms. 
  
 
The problem has been clearly understood and solution has been given in much detail.
   
    The proposer has not identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties.
  
There are no contingency plans in place for various outcomes.



Nonetheless one piece of advice for the proposer.  Make as many metrics which you can track easily. Use Trello or Notion or some similar project management tool.

The information provided is  sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal hence I have given it a  2 star rating.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is a large community which is largely untapped and ready to be introduced to cardano. I think it would gain a lot of interest among the gaming community. 
However the proposal has to increase the way in which Cardano is pushed to the forefront and actually marketed to the public.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer seems to have a good understanding of the field and has done sufficient research into what is required. I think it is important for the proposer to have good networking skills as this relies on the relationships made.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no real success criteria for this project. It would be better if the proposer provided some metric that can be used to quantify the success and allow for an agile workflow.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is related to the organization of the event to introduce the Gamers On-Chained Challenge to the EU Game community in 2022.
The problem statement raised is quite convincing and suitable for the Challenge. If possible, the proposer should be more explicit with some compelling arguments/evidence.
The proposed solution does not really represent the solution, rather, it is presenting more of the problem statement. The proposer should consider rewriting this passage, for better understanding. However, the solution is described clearly in detail and has a certain impact.
Therefore, I  can agree with this proposal's impact and give a score of 4.
f6_assessments.q1:
Team's skill, experiences is suitable for implementation of this proposal but withour any reference / proof (documents / links,...) for varifying; it is hard to verify team's ability through the provided link (because it is written in German, I guess). There is a lack of similar activities/achievement/ demo / pilot that is relevant. Only the total budget is provided. Risk/ challenge is not provided.  However, the event's program is provided in detail and show logical.
Therefore, I am neutral with this proposal's feasibility, I rate 3 points.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team's information has not been described in full and in detail; Also, did not provide relevant external links for verification. So the proposer needs to provide enough information about the proposer and the expected implementation team to make the proposal more transparent.
Information and presentation of Roadmap/Timeline, expected Budget are not clear, making it difficult for the community to monitor. The proposer needs to clearly state the expected activities along with the corresponding KPIs/metrics, detailed estimated budget (Ex: What is the estimated budget for each item mentioned in the "program" ? or What is the basis for calculating the expected budget?.... )

Therefore, I disagree with this proposal's auditability and give a score of 2.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal for #G4L Gaming Expo-Festival is being proposed by the host of the Cardano Convo Podcast who has produced a number of podcasts that highlight projects and initiatives being built in Cardano. The proposal is all about promoting Cardano to the billions of gamers and developers in the world who are looking for an in-road into crypto. In this way it would add value to the Cardano Ecosystem by driving new community members that are interested in bringing game development and games to Cardano and raise awareness about project Catalyst. The proposal is to support the cost of installing a physical booth within a tradeshowin Messe Dusseldorf that would promote Cardano to other booth holders and visitors, could be an interesting model to use to scale or transfer into other tradeshows.
f6_assessments.q1: The team behind this has 20+ years experience in gaming business, runs a successful podcast and is skilled in marketing. In this way they are well positioned to tackle a trade show of this nature and on-board new participants. The timeframe is clear, budget is not clearly marked out however there is further information about where exactly the funds will go further down in the comments.
f6_assessments.q2: The event will be streamed so community can audit the project progress that way, there are no specified targets or KPI's set, which could be addressed through setting an acheivable target for # of new game developers integrating cardano into their game. The timeframe is clear as there's a physical event deadline.

solution: Существует множество игорных выставок, но ни одна из них не продвигается Cardano! Так что это было бы хорошим началом, по крайней мере, в Европе.
experience:
Марцин: 20 лет опыта работы в игорном бизнесе, особенно в Европе (GSA)
Конвард: Ведущий подкаста Cardano Convo и эксперт по маркетингу
